title: SxS - XXX - Porn In The USA - 1985.mpg
description:
Porn In The USA (1985)

Starring:
Danielle   
Laurien Dominique

Amber Lynn

A loose conglomeration of porn scenes, probably from other movies, strung together in the form of a &#039;current affairs&#039; program with Foxx and Drake as the hosts. There are about eight scenes in all, and the quality of both filming, acting and actors is variable. Traci Lords plays a secretary who takes dictation from her boss; a door-to-door salesman finds only a willing schoolgirl at home; an older woman gives a teenage boy a lesson or two; there are hillbillies, an underwater sex scene complete with SCUBA gear, and even the two hosts are swept up in the sexual goings-on at the end of the compilation scenes. It&#039;s not a great porn flick, but by no means the worst.
